titles.title: Commercial Fisheries Waste Reduction Act of 1993
A bill to encourage the optimum utilization of fisheries resources, to reduce waste in commercial fish harvesting and processing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16775-16776)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Commercial Fisheries Waste Reduction Act of 1993 - Amends the Fisheries Conservation and Management Act to require fishery management plans to contain measures which encourage the non-wasteful taking of fishery resources, including the reduction of discards of fish and fish parts.
